items.question: Is this online invoice generator really 100% free?
items.answer: Yes, Invoify is completely free to use. There are no hidden fees, subscriptions, or limits on the number of invoices you can create.

items.question: Do I need to sign up to create an invoice?
items.answer: No, you do not need to create an account. You can start creating your invoice immediately. Your data is stored locally in your browser for privacy and convenience.

items.question: What information should I include on an invoice?
items.answer: A professional invoice should include a unique invoice number, your company details, client details, a clear description of services or products, dates, itemized costs, total amount due, and payment terms.

items.question: Can I add my business logo to the invoice templates?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can easily upload your logo, and it will appear on any professional invoice template you choose.

items.question: In what formats can I download my invoice?
items.answer: You can instantly download your invoice as a high-quality PDF. We also support exports to JSON, XLSX (Excel), CSV, and XML for your accounting needs.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Yes, your data is completely secure. All information is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers, ensuring your business and client information remains private.
